name: Rammerhead Profile
summary: Learn about .RF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Rammerhead is a proxy web browser that allows users to browse the Internet anonymously, through use of a proxy server. Typically, users access Rammerhead through another web browser, by navigating to https://browser.rammerhead.org.

To access Rammerhead's Settings page, users enter rh://settings in Rammerhead's address bar. There, users can set a custom HTTP proxy and customize Rammerhead's appearance. They can then select Export rammerfile to save these settings in an RF file.

description: An RF file is a settings file used by Rammerhead, a proxy web browser. It contains a user's Rammerhead profile. Users can export RF files from Rammerhead to back up their profile settings.

instructions: You can open an RF file with Rammerhead (Web). To do so:
Open Rammerhead and enter rh://settings in its address bar to access the Settings page.
Navigate to and open your RF file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rf file in Rammerhead
images.caption: RF file open in Rammerhead
